ygData.subject: Re: Question about 30th level song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You might want to check that again. At least when I tried it, prepatch (the one that was supposed to make the songs do more damage but didn t) it did 15
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Jan 04/00, kim@... wrote:
> On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, James Schuldes wrote:
> >
> > Hehe - the DoT from Fufils - is minimal at best. To me the MR debuff from
> > it was what attracted me to its use - we were fighting stuff that had high
> > resist rates - ie my bellows were getting resisted so I figured other
> > caster(s) were facing same problem and maybe my de-buff MR would help.
>
> That's what I thought at first too. The DoT by my estimate at
> L40 did 15-18 points per tick against mobs, or 45-54 points
> damage per application. Much better than Bellow, and
> (assuming I'm reapplying the song every 10 seconds as part of
> a three-some) equals a good fraction of my damage with
> weapons.

You might want to check that again. At least when I tried it, prepatch
(the one that was supposed to make the songs do more damage but didn't)
it did 15 dmg in 2 tics. After said patch, it did 10 dmg for 3 tics.
That was when I was L45, IIR.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
